ED_Title: Taking note of resolutions and decisions adopted through silence procedure from March till end of August 2020 under GA decision 74/544 entitled “Procedure for taking decisions of the General Assembly during the Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic”
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/74/49 (Vol. III)) after editorial review.
